directions: Cut tuna into 1/2 inch cubes, and place into a bowl.  Stir in the onion, green onions, ginger, jalapeno, lemon juice, and soy sauce; mix to combine.  Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours.  Taste before serving and add more lemon juice or soy sauce as needed.
ingredients: 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1/4 cup lemon juice, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste
title: Fresh Tuna Ceviche
